name: nimbus-cms-monorepo
description: Nimbus CMS monorepo: Studio (Vercel/Sanity), Admin SPA (Vercel/Vite), API (Railway/Express)

scripts.build: echo 'Root build noop. Use vercel-build-admin or vercel-build-studio when deploying from monorepo root.'
scripts.vercel-build-admin: npm --prefix apps/admin ci && npm --prefix apps/admin run build && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp -R apps/admin/dist/* dist/
scripts.vercel-build-studio: npm --prefix apps/studio install && npm --prefix apps/studio run build && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp -R apps/studio/dist/* dist/
scripts.vercel-build-all: npm run vercel-build-admin && npm run vercel-build-studio
